Display.description: Shows a message to the user and navigates to the next block
Display.purpose: User communication, status updates, results display

message.description: The message to display to the user

next_block.description: ID of the next block to navigate to

Input.description: Requests input from the user and waits for response

prompt.description: The prompt shown to request user input

Input.notes: Input blocks automatically await user response and halt flow execution until input is received

Conditional.description: Evaluates a condition and branches to different blocks

true_block.description: Block ID to navigate to if condition is true

false_block.description: Block ID to navigate to if condition is false

Compute.description: Performs computation and optionally navigates to next block

expression.description: Expression to evaluate or string to compute

output_key.description: Key to store the computation result in state

next_block.description: Next block ID. If omitted, uses 'default' for termination

Compute.notes: Compute blocks without next_block will terminate the flow naturally

GoTo.purpose: Flow control, jumping to specific blocks

target.description: ID of the target block to navigate to

ExternalData.description: Fetch or interact with external data sources and APIs
ExternalData.purpose: API calls, external service integration, data retrieval

next_block.description: ID of the next block to navigate to
